channel.title: Comments on: We ain’t afraid of no errors!
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: _missdani
item.dc:creator: _missdani
item.description: Hmm, sounds familiar! I usually think of error handling as an afterthought, I really should go back over the Power Point you had a few months ago.
item.content:encoded: Hmm, sounds familiar! I usually think of error handling as an afterthought, I really should go back over the Power Point you had a few months ago.
